other_tests.findings: Initial frozen section specimens were negative for malignancy; however, permanent sections revealed histologic evidence of well-differentiated adenocarcinoma and bronchoalveolar carcinoma.
Demonstrated increased activity in two areas with a maximum standardized uptake value (SUV) of 13.2 and 11.2, respectively; kaolin nodules showed SUVs ranging from 1 to 3.7.
